p: In this study, we found that DENV strains with different having molecular, phylogenetic, evolutionary, and virulence characteristics have been introduced into Korea by travelers. Considering that dengue infections usually cause inapparent or mild symptoms, the actual incidence of dengue infection in Korean travelers could be significantly higher than previously reported [ 15, 16]. Therefore, active surveillance of DENV infection should be performed for screening Korean travelers returning from tropical and subtropical countries.
